an4.168:1: Then the Venerable Mahāmoggallāna approached the Venerable Sāriputta … and said to him:
an4.168:2: "Friend Sāriputta, there are these four modes of practice …. Through which of these four modes of practice was your mind liberated from the taints by non-clinging?"
an4.168:3: "Of these four modes of practice, friend Moggallāna, it was through the mode that is pleasant with quick direct knowledge that my mind was liberated from the taints by non-clinging."
